title: Between the Scenes - Kanye West Claims Democrats Have Brainwashed Black People (Rebroadcast)
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Kanye West Claims Democrats Have Brainwashed Black People (Rebroadcast)
description:
Trevor takes issue with Kanye West's claim that black voters have been brainwashed into supporting Democratic candidates. Originally aired November 3, 2019.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
